thread.title: Judy Murray puts Scottish home on the market for £825,000
thread.title_full: Judy Murray puts Scottish home on the market for £825,000

title: Judy Murray puts Scottish home on the market for £825,000
text: show ad Judy Murray puts her luxury Scottish mansion on the market for £825,000 – and hints she might be moving closer to Sir Andy and family Tennis coach Judy Murray bought the Scottish mansion after 'falling in love' with the property five years ago The sprawling four-bedroom property boasts a gym, office, drawing room and breathtaking views Mrs Murray, 57, is now selling the story because of 'family logistics' and said she is ready to downsize
